Literature.Title: Molecular and functional identification of a β-defensin homolog in large yellow croaker (Larimichthys crocea).
Literature.Author: Li K, Li W, Chen X, Luo T, Mu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio campbellii(MIC=4µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=8µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=16µM),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas plecoglossicida(MIC=64µM)
